name: SOS
detailed_description:
CONGRATULATIONS, CONTESTANT!

You’ve been chosen to participate in SOS. An interactive game show in which you and 15 other contestants will be dropped onto La Cuna Island with one simple goal – Get the hell off La Cuna Island!

How it works is simple: Find a hidden relic, signal for extraction, and escape on the chopper. How to do it is hard: You’ll have to use your skills and your personality to build alliances, out-scheme opponents, and entertain the audience. There's also the hordes of bloodthirsty monsters to contend with.

If you’re lucky enough to survive, you’ll be greeted with fortune and fame.

SURVIVE THE DEADLY COMPETITION


Securing your spot on the escape helicopter won't be easy. Hordes of monsters and contestants will try to stop you on your way out. Experiment with various strategies to survive, from gearing up to going alone or forming a team of skilled survivors.

USE YOUR VOICE TO COMMUNICATE


Survival is key, but winning isn’t as simple as killing everyone else in the match. Forming ad hoc alliances, and putting your trust in the right people will greatly improve your chances of winning. Communicate with those within shouting distance using your mic, or your gestures!

MAKE ALLIES...AND ENEMIES


Of course, those alliances can be....temporary. You may decide that sometimes, betraying your friend and stealing their treasures is the best strategy to win. But remember: every action has a consequence, and it will affect your reputation and infamy. What will you be famous for?

GET THE GEAR


Resources on the island are limited. Learn to locate and open loot containers to secure the most coveted weapons and items on the island before others do. If they find them first, you can always use your wits and charms to convince them to trade them or give them to you. Maybe you have something they need, or have other powers of persuasion?

DEFEAT AND DECEIVE


Those powers might help you avoid some fights, but you will need your combat skills when it comes down to it. Learn to master shooting, melee and throwing weapons. You can throw pretty much anything at your enemy. Skulls and papayas included.

BEWARE THE MONSTERS


La Cuna is filled with mysterious and deadly creatures. You can avoid them or fight them if you think you have what it takes. Beware of their attacks though: they will infect you if you get too close. If you do not want to turn into a monster yourself, you will need to find an antidote to cure the infection, or eat mushroom to keep it contained while you can.

IMPRESS THE AUDIENCE


This is a show, after all, and whether you're a streamer or a gamer, SOS features a real live audience that can affect gameplay. Entertain the crowd, and they might just drop you some much needed resources! You’ll need them when the going gets rough.

PLAY WITH YOUR FRIEND


Want to play with your Steam friends? You can! Nothing is more powerful than relying on someone you really trust. Hop into the duo matches to spawn with your friend, and take down the competition.

CONTROL YOUR EXPERIENCE


You want to play with your community? Change the game objective, the number of survivors, the rules of gravity, your movement speed, the presence of monsters, and much more? You got it. SOS gives you all the tools to create your own matches, and change the experience however you see fit. Be the Director of your own Show!


SOS Twitter: https://twitter.com/playsosgame
SOS Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/playsosgame/
SOS Reddit: www.reddit.com/r/sosgame
Official website: http://sosgame.com

short_description: SOS is a social survival game where 16 contestants are dropped onto an island with one simple goal – get off the island! Players must find a relic, signal for extraction, and grab a spot on the rescue chopper by out-thinking and out-playing opponents while fending off monster hordes.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Korean, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit only (No OSX support at this time)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.4 GHZ or AMD Athlon X2 @ 2.8 GHZ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2GB or AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB DirectX11 (Shader Model 5)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit only
  • Processor: Intel quad-core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 4GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
